data.title: Mahender Agulduty on LinkedIn: #brand #badichowdi
data.text:
𝐑𝐞𝐜𝐨𝐠𝐧𝐢𝐳𝐞𝐝 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐞𝐝: 𝐎𝐝𝐢𝐬𝐡𝐚'𝐬 𝐑𝐞𝐝 𝐀𝐧𝐭 𝐂𝐡𝐮𝐭𝐧𝐞𝐲 𝐍𝐨𝐰 𝐆𝐈 𝐑𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐝! ▶ Kai Chutney, also known as Red Ant Chutney, has recently been awarded the prestigious GI Tag for its special taste and texture. ▶ Kai Chutney is a local cuisine in Odisha, made with a mix of spices and Weaver Red ants, which has numerous health benefits. ▶ Beyond being a local cuisine in Odisha, Kai Chutney is a livelihood for tribes, providing income through insect collection, preparation, and sales. 𝗪𝗛𝗔𝗧 𝗔𝗥𝗘 𝗚𝗜 𝗧𝗔𝗚𝗦 𝗔𝗡𝗗 𝗪𝗛𝗬 𝗔𝗥𝗘 𝗧𝗛𝗘𝗬 𝗜𝗠𝗣𝗢𝗥𝗧𝗔𝗡𝗧? ▶ Geographical Indication (GI) tags are like product birth certificates, marking their origin and assuring quality and uniqueness. ▶ GI Tags help raise awareness about the place of origin of a particular product as they also ensure only authorized users within the geographic area can use the product name, ensuring authenticity and exclusivity. ▶ Some other examples of popular GI tags include the Darjeeling Tea, Nagpur Oranges, Banarasi Saree, etc. #GITag #geographicalindications #intellectualproperty #redantchutney #odisha #LawUpdate #PhotonLegal

We're here to guide you every step of the way! 🚀 As an Associate Consultant at AbhiBar, I've spearheaded numerous transformative market research initiatives across a diverse range of industries. From non hand-woven bags to Dutch rose farming, ginger oil, ale, and paste powder, I've immersed myself in the nuances of each market, delivering actionable insights for our valued clients. 📈 Within our reports, we meticulously analyze market size, discern demand trends, and forecast future prospects, empowering businesses to pinpoint lucrative opportunities and navigate potential challenges with confidence. Moreover, we conduct exhaustive research on production processes, assess raw material supplier availability, and provide comprehensive feasibility analyses to determine the profitability of each venture. 💼 Whether you're a budding entrepreneur seeking to launch a groundbreaking product or an established business aiming to expand into new markets, our research reports offer the strategic guidance you need to thrive. 📧 Interested in accessing any of our research reports or discussing how we can support your next project? Feel free to reach out to us at samrat@abhibar.com. Let's collaborate and elevate your business to unprecedented heights! #MarketResearch #BusinessInsights #StrategicConsulting #MarketAnalysis #FeasibilityStudy #AbhiBar #ConsultingExcellence 🌟
